name: Budget Views
description: Plan vs actual budget comparison by area, course, and time period with variance tracking.

prd.problemStatement: Staying within budget requires understanding plan vs actual spending across different dimensions like area, time, and category.
goals: Break down by area and course
userStories: As a superintendent, I want plan vs actual views so that I can stay within budget
As a superintendent, I want area breakdowns so that I can identify cost hotspots
